author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...OCTAVE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY AS IT BEGINS TO TURN NORTH-NORTHEASTWARD...
summary: ...OCTAVE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY AS IT BEGINS TO TURN NORTH-NORTHEASTWARD... As of 2:00 AM PDT Sun Oct 05 the center of Octave was located near 15.6, -124.1 with movement NNE at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...OCTAVE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY AS IT BEGINS TO TURN NORTH-NORTHEASTWARD... As of 2:00 AM PDT Sun Oct 05 the center of Octave was located near 15.6, -124.1 with movement NNE at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Octave (EP5/EP152025)
